app_name.description: Name of the application.  Shown in the extensions list (chrome://extensions)

app_notif_sync_not_supported_os_1.message: App Notification Sync is only available on phones running Android 4.3 and above.

app_notif_sync_not_supported_os_2.description: part 2 of notif shown when android os does not support app notif sync
app_notif_sync_not_supported_os_2.message: Your phone is running an older version of Android.

auto_dismiss_explanation.description: content of notif shown on click of explanation icon in auto dismiss setting
auto_dismiss_explanation.message: If you enable this setting, we'll dismiss any MightyText message notifications after the specified time.

ba_error_popup_1.description: Error shown on click of greyed out BA icon
ba_error_popup_1.message: Unable to reach Mightytext.%br%Please check your connection.

ba_error_popup_2.description: Error shown on click of greyed out BA icon
ba_error_popup_2.message: Error connecting to MightyText. If this continues, please inform our team. We are sorry for the inconvenience.%br%%br%%bold%(Error Code: CRX-GU72)%bold_close%

bat_notif_settings.description: bat settings button shwon in notif of any bat related notifs. shortcut to settings

browser_action_no_int.description: part of the tooltip shown on hover of browser action icon (greyed out)

Unable to get your phone's notifications. Click here to try again.
